overview:
Alan has managed Palo Alto Software Incâ€™s European division since 2004. Palo Alto Software publish Business Plan Pro, the best selling business planning software product.

Prior to that Alan was a product manager at Barclays Plc the leading global financial services provider. He joined Barclays on their graduate programme in 1998 from University College Cork, Ireland and spent 5 years there, including time at Clearlybusiness a London-based innovation unit within Barclays.

Alan has an MBA from Oxford University, an MSc and B.Comm from University College Cork, Ireland and a Post Grad Diploma in eCommerce from Birkbeck College, University of London.
